data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Somogy. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Somogy, Hungary
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Somogy. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 328,500 citizens of Somogy, Hungary, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Somogy.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arab, general people might believe through him.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Somogy with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Somogy, Hungary to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Somogy, Hungary has a population of 328,500.

We estimate Somogy has 10,037 people who might know Jesus, 275,870 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 42,593 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Somogy, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

location.name: Somogy
location.people_groups_list: Chinese, general, Bosniak, Jew, Hungarian-speaking, Vietnamese, Turk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chinese, general (6,400), Bosniak (19,000), Jew, Hungarian-speaking (47,000), Vietnamese (3,300), Turk (2,500)
